question:
Clear the current Blender scene and remove all PolyHaven materials.
Create a default Camera and position it at (X=0, Y=-10, Z=1). Change the Camera's lens type to 'Orthographic'. Set the Camera's 'Orthographic Scale' to 8.1. Create an Empty object (any type) named 'FocusPoint' and position it at (X=0, Y=0, Z=1.1). Enable Depth of Field for the Camera. Instead of using the Focus Object, set the DOF 'Focus Distance' to exactly 10.1 meters. Set the Aperture 'F-Stop' value to 2.8. After finishing all tasks, create a new file and save it as 'tid_19.blend' in the '{{MCPUniverse_DIR}}/mcpuniverse/evaluator/blender/blend_files'.
